com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier

Interface SignatureVerifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KSISignatureVerifier

    public interface SignatureVerifier
    Signature verification interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VerificationResult verify(VerificationContext context, Policy policy)
      This method is used to verify KSI signature.

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(VerificationContext context,
                          Policy policy)
                   throws KSIException
        This method is used to verify KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        context - context to be used to verify signature.
        policy - policy to be used to verify signature
        Returns:
        instance of VerificationResult containing verification information
        Throws:
        KSIException - if exception occurs
